Ms. Becky Smith of Cecilton is 104 years old and almost getting along better than I am. Her secret to life: keep moving, and don’t ever give up. 

I had a pleasant discussion with Becky today about her life, family, the Town of Cecilton, and local and national politics. pic.twitter.com/YcDhGLYAkG
